description:
A woman who works in the Ciel blue de fleur near Tsabuki manor. Ayano`s dream has apparently always been to open her own flower shop. Haruma has a crush on her, but has so far been unable to work up the nerve to do anything about it. It seems that she remains oblivious of Haruma`s affections and sees him as no more than a good acquaintance.
Source: Wiki
name: Sonozaki Ayano
